dev.wolveringer.api.particel

Class ParticleEffect.OrdinaryColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.wolveringer.api.particel.ParticleEffect.ParticleColor
      • dev.wolveringer.api.particel.ParticleEffect.OrdinaryColor
  • Enclosing class:
    ParticleEffect

    public static class ParticleEffect.OrdinaryColor
extends ParticleEffect.ParticleColor
    Represents the color for effects like ParticleEffect.SPELL_MOB, ParticleEffect.SPELL_MOB_AMBIENT and ParticleEffect.NOTE

    This class is part of the ParticleEffect Library and follows the same usage conditions

    Since:
    1.7
    Author:
    DarkBlade12
